targetExampleSentences: Se retiró tras pasar 50 años trabajando.

nativeExampleSentences: The receptionist asked me to hold the line.
targetExampleSentences: El recepcionista me pidió que no me retirara.

nativeExampleSentences: I moved back to let him park.
targetExampleSentences: Me retiré para que pudiera aparcar.

nativeExampleSentences: I'll go to bed now as I have an early start tomorrow.
I think I'll retire now; good night!
targetExampleSentences: Me voy a retirar, que mañana madrugo.

nativeExampleSentences: Many thanks; you can leave now if you wish.
If there isn't anything else, you may go now.
targetExampleSentences: Muchas gracias, ya puede retirarse si quiere.
Si no hay nada más, puede retirarse.

nativeExampleSentences: The soldiers retreated because of the enemy's superior forces.
targetExampleSentences: Los soldados se retiraron a causa de las fuerzas superiores enemigas.

nativeExampleSentences: The cyclist pulled out of the race just a few meters from the finish.
I had to withdraw from the competition when I caught a cold.
targetExampleSentences: El ciclista se retiró de la carrera a pocos metros de la meta.
Tuve que retirarme del concurso cuando me resfrié.

nativeExampleSentences: The shaman took himself off to the depths of the jungle to find himself.
Tired of the city, she went away to an isolated spot in Patagonia.
Alfredo decided to retire to a monastery to meditate.
targetExampleSentences: El chamán se retiró a lo más profundo de la selva en busca de sí mismo.
Cansada de la ciudad, se retiró a un sitio alejado de la Patagonia.
Alfredo se decidió a retirarse a un monasterio para meditar.
